fr.upmc.components.interfaces

Interface DataTwoWayI.PushI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ComponentImplementedI, OfferedI, java.rmi.Remote, RequiredI, TwoWayI
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DataTwoWayConnectorI, DataTwoWayPortI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDataTwoWayConnector, AbstractDataTwoWayPort, DataTwoWayConnector
    Enclosing interface:
    DataTwoWayI

    public static interface DataTwoWayI.PushI
extends TwoWayI
    The interface TwoWayDataI.PushI contains the signature of the method that is called by one component to send data to the other component.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : 21 janv. 2014

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

          throws java.lang.Exception
        used in push mode to send a piece of data to the other component.

        Contract

         pre    sender != null
 post   true                    // no postcondition.
